title: card.binary.put Request Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description:
Adds binary data to the binary storage area of the Notecard. The Notecard expects to receive binary data immediately following the usage of this API command.

See the guide on [Sending and Receiving Large Binary Objects](/guides-and-tutorials/notecard-guides/sending-and-receiving-large-binary-objects) for best practices when using `card.binary`.

cobs.description: The size of the COBS-encoded data (in bytes).

offset.description: The number of bytes to offset the binary payload from 0 when appending the binary data to the binary storage area of the Notecard. Primarily used when sending multiple fragments of one binary payload to the Notecard.

status.description: The MD5 checksum of the data, before it has been encoded.

samples.title: Put Binary Data
samples.description: Send binary data with MD5 checksum.
